scholarships.name: Linamar Scholarships for Women in Engineering and Business
scholarships.description:
10 female students entering HBA 1 with the intention of completing the dual degree program in Engineering and Ivey (BESc/HBA)

Applicant must be an Undergraduate Student
Applicant must have taken or plan to enroll in BUSINESS 2257
Applicant must be a Year 2
Applicant must be legally entitled to work in Canada upon Graduation
Applicant must have applied or intend to apply to the Concurrent degree program with Ivey School of Business and Western Engineering

scholarships.name: Adam Wiseman Memorial Award
scholarships.description: Awarded annually to an HBA 2 student at the Richard Ivey School of Business at the end of his or her second year of the program. This student has demonstrated an enthusiastic attitude and approached class discussions with humour, intelligence and tenacity.

scholarships.name: Ivey HBA 2 Merit Awards Application 2018-19
scholarships.description:
For those interested in applying for the general Ivey HBA2 awards and scholarships, the online award application must be completed in full.
 
Dual degree students:  these awards are for students in their HBA2 year (could be a combined year but must include HBA2 courses).  The application questions w

blogPosts.title: Bain Consulting, RBC Investment Banking, Ivey Business School and Why he declined Goldman Sachs: Paul Okundaye — Atila TV 006
blogPosts.description: Paul is an incoming management consultant at Bain and Company. Before that he was an investment banking summer analyst at RBC after declining an interview at Goldman Sachs and founder of a food delivery company called Dine Easy. He is currently in his final year in the honours business program at the Ivey Business School.

blogPosts.title: Facebook Product Manager, ex-Shopify PM, First Employee at Brainstation and Why She Declined Ivey:  Annie Zhang — Atila TV 003
blogPosts.description: Annie Zhang is a product manager at Facebook, working on the Facebook Watch team. Before that she was a PM at Shopify and the first employee at Brainstation. Annie graduated from Western with a Philosophy, politics and economics (PPE) degree after declining her acceptance into the Ivey business school program at Western University.

essays.title: Ivey Business School AEO2 Application 2016
essays.description:
My AEO2 University application for Ivey Business School 2016.
This is the application I submitted after my 2nd year of university to keep my spot in the HBA1 as part of the AEO program.
           I applied to the software engineering and business program. 

The admissions person I talked to mentioned they cared a lot about community involvement and leadership which I tried to highlight in the first 2 examples.

essays.title: Ivey Business School AEO Application 2014
essays.description:
My AEO University application for Ivey Business School 2014.
           I applied to the software engineering and business dual degree program. Ivey places an emphasis on leadership so I really try to highlight how I demonstrate strong leadership in the examples I give in my essay.

essays.title: Ivey Business School AEO Application 2015
essays.description: As part of my AEO application to the Ivey Business School I had to submit an essay describing 3 activities in which I was involved. I also tried to highlight how each activity showcases my leadership skills.
